Academic collaboration means a formal relationship of an educational nature with third parties, such as joint degree programs, memoranda of understanding, joint institutes or centers, and similar relationships.

patterns: what is the admission requirement of your university?
can you tell me the admission requirements?
what are the requirements to get admitted?
what documents do I need for admission?
how do I get admission to your university?
responses: The minimum GPA in SSC/Dakhil and HSC/Alim or equivalent examinations must be 6.00 and at least 3.00 for each.

For A-Level Students: A student must complete at least 2 subjects, and before that, students must complete at least 5 subjects for O-Levels. A science background will be required to get admission to Engineering Programs.

For Diploma Engineering Students: Must have completed 3 or 4 years of diploma in any Engineering discipline from Bangladesh Technical Education Board (BTEB) with a minimum CGPA of 2.5 out of 4.00. OR A Diploma recognized by BTEB with a CGPA of 2.5 out of 4.00 in any engineering discipline from recognized institutions.

For MBA and Masters in Islamic Finance: Students must have a Bachelor's Degree in any discipline of study from any recognized university or a renowned institute. Candidates having foreign University degrees/diplomas/certificates may also apply.

For the children of Freedom Fighters: In the case of sons/daughters of Freedom Fighters, a total GPA of at least 5.00 in both SSC and HSC Examinations is required. However, candidates must include the official proof of the Father /Mother as a Freedom Fighter with the form.

patterns: what documents are required for admission?
can you tell me about the admission process?
responses: Original certificates, mark sheets, and testimonials. Attested photocopies of all certificates, mark sheets, and testimonials. Applicant must submit a photocopy of the NID/Birth certificate of the (i) Applicant, (ii) Applicant's father and mother, and (iii) Tuition fee provider. Recently clicked four copies of passport-size and two copies of stamp-size color photographs.

Applicants can also collect admission forms from the Admission Office of the University of Scholars. Applicants must submit the completed application form to the Admission Office. The Admission Office of IUS will let you know the date and venue of the admission test (if you are eligible). Please pay attention to the Notice Board for admission test results.

responses: For Any Information Related Support; Please Contact: 01311057962 (Admission Office), 01844505111 (Admin Office), 01629444666 (Student Advisor). E-Mail: info@ius.edu.bd. Address: Bulu Ocean Tower, 40 Kemal Ataturk Ave, Banani, Dhaka 1212.

patterns: do you offer any discounts or waivers?
responses: 100% Waiver for Freedom Fighters' Children (As per Govt. Rules). Up to 100% Waiver for Players. Up to 20% of Need-Based Scholarships. Up to 100% Result-Based Waiver.
One needs to provide a hard copy application - directed to the Chief Coordinating Officer (CCO) of the University of Scholars to the Admission Office for any other additional scholarship offers.

responses: The University of Scholars has funded various clubs that the faculty members and students have built together. Almost all the departments at The University of Scholars are associated with one or more than one clubs.

The University of Scholars has funded various clubs - Scholars Photography Club, International University of Scholars Debate Club, IUSDC Scholars Communication Club, Scholars Sports Club, Electronics Club, Scholars Startup Club.

patterns: tell me about the history of your university
what is the history of the University of Scholars?
can you share the history of University of Scholars?
how did the University of Scholars start?
when was the University of Scholars established?
responses: The International University of Scholars, popularly known as the University of Scholars, started its journey in 2015 with a campus at Badda with five departments at the outset. The Trustee Board of the University aims to establish a research-intensive modern private university for Bangladeshi and international students who will produce world-class researchers and industry-leading professionals. The first batch of enrolment was done in 2016. The graduation of the 1st Master's batch was held in 2018, and the graduation of the 1st Undergraduate batch was held in 2020. In 2021, the University moved to its permanent campus at Kemal Ataturk Avenue, Banani.

patterns: what is the mission of this university
tell me about the mission of your university
what is the vision of University of Scholars?
can you tell me the mission of your university?
what does the University of Scholars aim to do?
responses: The International University of Scholars, popularly known as the University of Scholars, started its journey in 2015 with a campus at Badda with five departments at the outset. The Trustee Board of the University aims to establish a research-intensive modern private university for Bangladeshi and international students who will produce world-class researchers and industry-leading professionals. The first batch of enrolment was done in 2016. The graduation of the 1st Master's batch was held in 2018, and the graduation of the 1st Undergraduate batch was held in 2020. In 2021, the University moved to its permanent campus at Kemal Ataturk Avenue, Banani.
To build highly competent professionals to meet the need of multi-skilled human resources in order to contribute towards sustainable development locally and globally.

patterns: can you tell me about the campus?
what facilities does the campus have?
responses: We say we have the most well-decorated campus among all the universities. The University has a beautiful mosque and a library on the 10th floor with a separate study zone area where the students have all-time access. A play zone is located on the 16th floor where students can spend their leisure time enjoying playing games like billiards, air hockey, table tennis, and also play station games.
Address: Bulu Ocean Tower, 40 Kemal Ataturk Ave, Banani, Dhaka 1212.

patterns: What facilities are available at the university?
What facilities are available for students?
What is available for student support?
responses: We provide a range of student facilities, including a library, gym, cafeterias, student lounges, and recreational areas.

patterns: Can you tell me about the faculty?
responses: Our faculty consists of highly qualified professionals with years of experience in their respective fields.

patterns: What is the hostel facility like?

responses: Yes, we have hostel facilities for students with comfortable accommodations and all necessary amenities.

patterns: What events are happening at the university?

responses: The University of Scholars organizes numerous events, including seminars, cultural activities, sports events, and academic workshops.

patterns: What is available in the library?

responses: Our library has a vast collection of books, journals, and e-resources to support your academic studies.

patterns: What career support is available for students?
How can I get a job after graduation?
responses: Yes, we have a dedicated career services team to help with job placement, internships, career counseling, and skill development.

patterns: How can I get an internship?
Are there any internship opportunities available?
responses: We provide internship opportunities in various industries to give students hands-on experience and improve their career prospects.
The University encourages students to participate in research projects, with various research centers and faculty-led initiatives.

patterns: Tell me about student life at the university.
What activities are available for students?
responses: Student life at the University of Scholars is vibrant, with plenty of social events, clubs, sports, and academic activities to be part of.

patterns: When do I need to apply for admission?

responses: The admission deadline for the upcoming semester is [date]. Be sure to check the official website for updates.

patterns: Can you tell me about available scholarships?
How can I apply for a scholarship?
responses: We offer various scholarships, including need-based, merit-based, and sports scholarships. Please visit the scholarship section of our website for more details.

patterns: How can I get admitted to your university?
responses: To apply, you need to meet the minimum academic requirements and submit the necessary documents. Please refer to our admissions page for detailed requirements.

patterns: Do you have an alumni network?
How can I join the alumni network?
What is the alumni community like?
responses: We have a strong alumni network that helps current students with career advice, internships, and job placements.

patterns: How can students get help with their studies?
responses: Yes, we provide academic counseling, tutoring services, and psychological support to ensure our students' success and well-being.

patterns: Can I study abroad through your university?
responses: Yes, we have student exchange programs that allow you to study at partner universities around the world.

patterns: How can I apply for a student visa?

responses: International students may need a visa to study at our university. Please visit the international office for detailed visa application guidelines.

patterns: How can I get to the campus?
responses: Unfortunately, we do not have transportation services at this time, but there are several public transport options nearby.

patterns: Do you offer workshops and seminars?
What workshops are available for students?
responses: Yes, the university hosts a variety of workshops and seminars throughout the year to enhance skills and knowledge in various fields.

patterns: Do you have a health center?

Can students access health services on campus?
responses: Yes, we have a health center on campus that provides basic medical services, including consultations, treatments, and health advice.

patterns: Is there a dress code at the university?
Do I need to follow any dress code?
responses: There is no strict dress code at the University of Scholars. However, students are expected to dress in a professional and respectful manner while on campus.

patterns: Can you tell me the class schedule?
How do I know my class timings?
responses: Class schedules are provided at the beginning of each semester and can be accessed via the student portal. You can also check the notice board for updates.

patterns: How can I pay my fees?

responses: Tuition fees can be paid via bank transfer, online payment portals, or at the university’s finance office. Please check the university's payment guidelines for more details.

patterns: How can I get my student email?
Do I get a university email?
responses: Yes, all students are provided with a university email address. You will receive it after your registration is completed.

patterns: Do you have security on campus?
How safe is the university campus?
responses: Yes, the campus is equipped with 24/7 security and surveillance systems to ensure the safety of students, staff, and visitors.

patterns: Can I study abroad during my program?

responses: Yes, the university offers several study abroad opportunities in collaboration with partner universities around the world.

patterns: Where can I find the university policies?

responses: University policies, including rules and regulations, can be found on the official website under the 'Policies' section.

patterns: What is the ranking of the university?
responses: The University of Scholars is ranked among the top private universities in Bangladesh. For more information, please refer to the rankings section of our website.

patterns: What kind of activities are there for students?
responses: We have a variety of student clubs and extracurricular activities ranging from sports and arts to academic and social clubs. You can join based on your interests.

patterns: What facilities does the campus offer?

responses: Our campus offers state-of-the-art facilities including lecture halls, laboratories, a library, a gym, and recreational areas for students.

patterns: Can I give feedback about the university?

responses: Yes, we welcome student feedback! You can submit feedback through the student portal or directly at the student affairs office.

patterns: Are there any public transport options to the university?

responses: Yes, the university is well-connected by public transport, including buses and metro stations. You can find detailed directions on the university’s website.

patterns: When do I need to pay my tuition fees?

responses: Tuition fees are due at the start of each semester. You can find the exact payment deadlines and schedule on the university’s finance page.
